page.title: 07 HOUSING
page.content: As our square is mainly residential with a high population we decided to study the housing in the area. Until the early 1960s most of our area would have been a farming area. Our parents and a teacher remember playing in the fields where Trench Park,Dalebrook and Ladybrook now stand. The Oldest house is situated on Finaghy Road and was built in 1931. It is directly opposite the newest development, Appleton Park where 79 units will be completed in 1986. The types of housing in this area include flats, terraced, semi-detached and detached. The housing is generally in estates which are serviced by local shops. As the only major industry in the area is the Ford Motor Company most people travel out of the area for work.
